alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Gratiot (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 3:04PM EDT until August 03 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gratiot County in central Michigan... Clinton County in south central Michigan... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 303 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of St. Johns to near Portland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Johns... Ithaca... Grand Ledge... Elsie... DeWitt... Eureka... Ovid... Fowler... North Star... Westphalia... Maple Rapids... Ashley... Perrinton... Hubbardston... Eagle... Wacousta... Bath... Bannister... Pompeii... Middleton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
